SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
REFERRAL MARKETING
Create the Referral Marketing Analytics App

Referral Marketing comes with a CRM Analytics app template. The Referral Marketing app template consists of a set of dashboard and components that help marketing managers and business executives track the performance of referral programs and of their promotions. The admin can use a guided setup to create a CRM Analytics app by using the Referral Marketing app template.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions with Referral Marketing


USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To set up Referral Marketing Analytics:	

View Setup and Configuration

AND

Customize Application


To assign permission sets:	Assign Permission Sets
From Setup, in the Quick Find box, enter Referral Marketing, and then select Referral Marketing Analytics.
Expand Let Admins Set Up CRM Analytics and click Assign Permission Set.
The Permission Sets page opens in a new tab.
Assign yourself these permission sets:
CRM Analytics Admin OR CRM Analytics Plus Admin
Loyalty Analytics Admin
On the guided setup, expand Get Started with CRM Analytics Setup and click Enable CRM Analytics.
The CRM Analytics Get Started page opens in a new tab.
Click Enable CRM Analytics.
On the guided setup, expand Configure Data Access for Referral Marketing Analytics and select the security predicate that determines the users’ access to Referral Marketing data.
Expand Get Analytics for Referral Marketing and turn on Enable.
The installation of the Referral Marketing App starts in the background.
Expand Let Users Access CRM Analytics for Referral Marketing App and click Assign Permission Set.
The Permission Sets page opens in a new tab.
Assign these permission sets to users who need access to the Referral Marketing Analytics app:
CRM Analytics User OR CRM Analytics Plus User
Loyalty Analytics User

It can take up to an hour for the Referral Marketing app to be installed in the org. You can track the installation status on the Requests tab of the Auto-Installed Apps page in Setup.

TIP You can also create and share a CRM Analytics app for Referral Marketing from Analytics Studio by using the Referral Marketing Analytics template.
SEE ALSO
Salesforce Help: Create and Share an App from a CRM Analytics Template
